```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, comment=NA)

library(jsonlite)
library(kableExtra)
library(mongolite)
library(dplyr)

# Connect to the database
# mongodb://[username:password@]host1[:port1]/?authSource=user-data
connection_string = 'mongodb://abi:80907299@139.162.17.142:27017/?authSource=user-data'
db <- mongolite::mongo(collection="minit", db="oa", url=connection_string)
minit <- db$find('{"Siri": 1}')

# minit_bak <- read_json("minit_exco_1_22.json")
```

### Hadir: 

```{r hadir}
lst <- tibble("Nama"=unlist(minit$Hadir$nama),"Singkatan"=unlist(minit$Hadir$Singkatan),"Jawatan"=unlist(minit$Hadir$Jawatan)) 
lst %>% 
  kbl(booktabs = T,longtable = TRUE) %>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options = "hold_position",position = "left")
```

### Tidak Hadir (dengan maaf)

```{r tidak hadir}
nst <- tibble(unlist(minit$`Tidak hadir (dengan maaf)`$Nama),unlist(minit$`Tidak hadir (dengan maaf)`$Singkatan),unlist(minit$`Tidak hadir (dengan maaf)`$Jawatan))
nst %>% 
  kbl(col.names = c("Nama","Singkatan","Jawatan"), booktabs = T) %>% 
  kable_styling(latex_options = "hold_position",position = "left")
```

### AGENDA 1: `r minit$Agenda$'1'$Perkara` 

```{r agenda 1, echo=FALSE}
minit$Agenda$`1`$Keterangan %>% 
  kbl(col.names = "","html", booktabs = T) %>% 
  kable_styling(full_width = TRUE,position = "left")
paste("@.  Keputusan.",minit$Agenda$`1`$Keputusan) %>% 
  kbl(col.names = "","html", booktabs = T) %>% 
  kable_styling(full_width = TRUE,position = "left")

```
